overview: Ran has over fifteen years of international experience managing product development, strategy and marketing in the Internet and telecommunication industries. Before Moblica, Ran was head of product management at Followap Inc, establishing the company as the market leader in Mobile IM, leading to its acquisition. Ran was also a Product and R&D manager at Check Point Software Technologies, leading networking and high availability products. Ran is a graduate of Mamram, and holds a B.Sc. in Computer Science and an MBA from AGSM.
